questions.question: It is illegal to park a vehicle if a traffic signal is within:
What does this sign mean?
A center left-turn lane must be used for:
Bells, sirens, and whistles on a private car are:
This road sign tells you that:
choices: The road ahead turns sharply to the right, then left
There is a road work detour ahead

questions.question: Before reaching this sign:
choices: You must slow down and yield to other vehicles
You should pass other vehicles on the shoulder
You must complete any passing maneuver

questions.question: The three-second rule helps a driver know:
choices: How much time it takes to pass
How closely to follow another vehicle

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
Suspension of a driving privilege is the same as:
choices: A withdrawal of a driver's license or driving privilege until the driver is able to qualify again
A temporary withdrawal of a driver's license or driving privilege for a definite period of time
A withholding of a driver's license or driving privilege because the person is ineligible for a license

questions.question: When a school bus activates flashing amber lights:
choices: You may still pass, if safe
You should try to pass as soon as possible

questions.question: A car passenger who five years of age and less than 4 feet 9 inches tall must:
choices: Be properly restrained in a booster seat
Be in a booster seat when riding in the front seat only

questions.question: This sign means:
choices: U-turn permitted on green arrow only

questions.question: A traffic signal showing a steady yellow light means:
What is the first thing you should do when your car starts to skid?
choices: Steer in the opposite direction of the skid
Take your foot off the gas pedal

questions.question: When passing another vehicle on a two-lane highway, you must return to your lane before you get within the following distance of an oncoming vehicle:
You want to overtake the vehicle ahead of you. Which pavement marking tells you that you are allowed to pass?
choices: The solid white line on the right side of the road

questions.question: Signals and directions from a flag person in a construction zone:
choices: Is only advisory, but proceed with caution

questions.question: You must always stop before a railroad crossing if:
choices: There is not enough room on the other side to completely cross the tracks
You have young children in the car
The crossing is marked with only a crossbuck sign

questions.question: This sign tells you that:
choices: There will be fewer lanes ahead

questions.question: You see this sign attached to the back of a vehicle ahead. What should you do?
choices: Reduce your speed and use caution

questions.question: You approach this sign. What should you expect ahead?
choices: An intersection where you must turn right

questions.question: What color is used for road signs that warn you of potentially hazardous conditions ahead?
What should you expect ahead?
choices: Oncoming traffic on the same roadway

questions.question: On a highway with several lanes traveling in the same direction, the right lane should be used for:
When parking close to an intersection you must keep this distance:
You may cross a solid yellow line:
choices: When you need to pass slower traffic
When you want to turn into a private road
At any time if it is safe to do so

questions.question: Up to what age must children be restraint in an approved child safety seat OR booster seat?
If you let your driver's license expire, you are entitled to:
Where is the pavement marked with the letters RR and a large X?
If your vehicle starts to skid or hydroplane, you should:
choices: Try to steer off the road

questions.question: When you see a sign with this shape and color, you must:
choices: Slow down and proceed with caution
Stop completely and check for traffic
Not enter the road in the direction you are heading

questions.question: When a traffic officer is directing you to drive against a red light, you should:
choices: Wait until somebody else follows the directions

questions.question: What does the three-second rule mean?
choices: You should keep at least a three-second distance between you and the car ahead
You should be able to bring your car to a complete stop in three seconds
You should check your speed every third second

questions.question: If red lights are flashing at a railroad crossing, you must:
choices: Reduce speed, look both ways, and drive carefully across tracks
Proceed through the crossing as quickly as possible
Always stop and remain stopped until the lights stop flashing

questions.question: The following are true about large trucks except:
choices: They have bigger blind spots than most cars

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
When you see a sign with this shape, color, and symbol, you must:
choices: Stop completely and yield to pedestrians and cross traffic

questions.question: A driver may pass another vehicle on the right:
choices: When it is possible to drive off the roadway to pass
When the vehicle being overtaken blocks traffic
When the vehicle being overtaken is about to make a left turn

questions.question: What is the background color on a warning sign like this?
To back up on an interstate highway:
choices: Is permitted if there is a paved shoulder
Is permitted if you do not interfere with other traffic

questions.question: When approaching a stopped school bus with flashing red lights traveling in the opposite direction on a two-lane roadway with an additional center turning lane, you must:
choices: Stop only if children are crossing the street

questions.question: What is the meaning of this sign?
choices: Another road enters from the left

questions.question: When making a right turn, you should do all the following except:
choices: Drive close to the right edge of the road
Signal at least 100 feet before the turn
Try to make the turn as wide as possible

questions.question: When a traffic signal is showing a flashing red light, you must:
choices: Stop completely, only proceed when you can do so safely
Proceed as normal, crossing traffic must always stop
Stop completely and remain stopped until a green signal appears

questions.question: What is true about braking if you suddenly have a tire blowout while driving?
choices: Stay off the brakes or brake gently

questions.question: Which classified driver's license allows you to drive any single motor vehicle with a GVWR of 26,001 pounds or more?
You want to turn left ahead. There is a shared left turn lane in the center of the road. What should you do?
choices: Prepare for and make the turn from any lane
Make the turn sharply across the center lane
Enter the center lane while preparing for the turn

questions.question: The Do Not Enter sign is an example of a regulatory sign, and it is:
Yellow lines separate traffic:
If a vehicle comes toward you with high beams on, you can be blinded if you:
choices: Flash your own headlights to alert the other driver
Slow down and look to the right side of the road
Look at the other vehicle's headlights

questions.question: When approaching a stationary highway maintenance vehicle on a multi-lane roadway, you must:
choices: Vacate the lane closest to the vehicle, if possible
Keep your speed and avoid stopping

questions.question: Which is one factor that significantly affects your stopping distance?
This sign means that:
choices: Another road enters the highway from the direction shown
The road will make a sharp turn to the left
A road crosses the main highway ahead

questions.question: When you drive through a work zone, you should:
choices: Decrease distance between you and any car ahead
Be prepared to slow down or stop
Slow down to watch the ongoing work

questions.question: Parking on the roadside of another parked vehicle (double parking):
choices: Is allowed on a one-way street
Is allowed, unless there is a sign that prohibits parking

questions.question: If you approach a passive railroad crossing with no lights or gates to warn of approaching trains:
choices: You must stop whether or not a train is coming
You must stop as necessary and yield to any rail traffic
Trains will always stop before proceeding through the crossing

questions.question: What does this road sign mean?
If a yellow center line is solid on your side of the road, it means:
What does this sign mean?
choices: Traffic will be merging from right

questions.question: What do the light gray areas in the picture mark?
If you hit a parked car and are unable to find the owner, you must:
choices: Report it to the police or leave necessary information at the scene
File a crash report with the BMV

questions.question: When you want to make a right turn at an intersection with a steady red light, you should:
choices: Signal and stop. Turn if it is safe and no sign prohibits turning
Slow down and check for traffic before turning
Signal and wait until the light turns green

questions.question: If you run off the pavement, it is usually unsafe and dangerous to:
choices: Take your foot off the gas pedal
Force the vehicle back onto the roadway by jerking the steering wheel

questions.question: Lane-hopping or weaving in and out of traffic is an example of:
You are driving on a rural highway. You see an orange diamond-shaped road sign far ahead. The sign will:
choices: Warn you of road works ahead
Mark the beginning of a no-passing zone

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
Upon the approach of an emergency vehicle displaying flashing lights and an audible signal, a driver must:
choices: Immediately drive to a position parallel to the right edge or curb and stop
Not change speed or position, unless directed to do so
Reduce speed and, whenever it is possible, change lanes

questions.question: Which car or cars are NOT driving in the truck's typical blind spots?
Unless it is posted otherwise, what is the basic speed limit on state routes or through highways except controlled-access highways within municipal corporations outside business districts?
In this situation (approaching the bicyclist from behind), you should:
choices: Honk your horn and pass on the other half of the roadway
Slow down, keep distance, and pass only when it is safe
Flash your headlights and pass on the other half of the roadway

questions.question: This road sign means:
choices: You must bear either right or left ahead
The roadway you are on ends ahead

questions.question: When parking close to a fire hydrant, you must keep what distance?
